game_short_description: A unique card game created by Giant Light Studios and Ezra Szanton. Play for free in your browser!
game_description_paragraph_1: Mr. Magpie's Harmless Card Game is an engaging browser-based card game that challenges your strategic thinking. Developed by Giant Light Studios and Ezra Szanton, this game offers a unique gaming experience right in your browser.
game_description_paragraph_2: With its simple yet addictive gameplay, you'll find yourself coming back for more. No downloads required - play instantly on any device!
game_feature_4: No downloads needed - play in browser
game_tips: Plan your moves carefully to maximize your points
Pay attention to your opponent's previous moves
Save your special cards for critical moments
